Title: Establishes a datacenter utility rate classification, providing targeted congestion management incentives for upstate New York, and regulating off-grid power connections for datacenter operations
Summary: Establishes a datacenter utility rate classification, providing targeted congestion management incentives for upstate New York, and regulating off-grid power connections for datacenter operations.
LawCode: Add §§66-x & 66-y, Pub Serv L; add Art 5 §5-105, Energy L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the energy law, in relation to establishing a datacenter utility rate classification, providing targeted congestion management incentives for upstate New York, and regulating off-grid power connections for datacenter operations
